page.title: 13Social Concerns
page.content: There are quite alot of problems in { {Ormesby,}mainly vandalism, glue sniffing and break ins. Our school has been broken into many times and the windows are often broken. People who break into our school don't usually take anything, but just leave a mess. Our school had a pond but someone kept vandqlising it so we filled it in. There are many telephone boxes vandalised around the area and a lot of them are not fit to use. Some shops where I live have been broken into recently and there were lots of things taken. There is a lot of glue sniffing in Ormesby, mainly near Church Lane. Our class saw some glue sniffers going across our field. People sniff glue for a dare and then get addicted.
